DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate peer-led mutual help organization ( MHOs ) target individual psychiatric diagnosis mood disorder , provide evidence either support expansion group development test clinical procedure , point toward reevaluation development alternative low-cost , community base approach promote recovery among individual suffer disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Outcomes , Reducing Costs : Evaluating Peer Support Mood Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: Participants include 200 participant The Depression Bipolar Support Alliance ( DBSA ) Aim 1 . Aim 1 measure characteristic current DBSA member cross-sectional survey demographic , clinical use history , involvement DBSA . 60 new DBSA member begin attend past month enrol Aim 2 . Aim 3 consist 100 match control people never attend DBSA meeting . Assessments complete McLean Hospital , study staff member thoroughly explain study participant . If participant eligible Aim 2 , study staff receive write consent participant .
DOC.criteria: Aim 1 : 18 year age old Selfreport diagnosis type mood disorder Attend DBSA meeting Aim 2 : 18 year age old Selfreport diagnosis type mood disorder Have attend first meet past month Aim 3 : 18 year age old Selfreport diagnosis type mood disorder Have never attend DBSA meeting Aim 1 : Do report diagnosis type mood disorder Have attend DBSA meeting Aim 2 : Do report diagnosis type mood disorder Have attend DBSA meeting Have attend first meeting prior month assessment Aim 3 : Do report diagnosis type mood disorder Have attend DBSA meeting
